title.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Dec. 20, 1920. For the Benefit of a Crippled Soldier

div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Dec. 20, 1920. FOR THE BENEFIT OF A CRIPPLED SOLDIER

body.p: Mr. Frank Wolf, of 2416 South 58th Avenue, Cicero, has undertaken a collection for the benefit of a crippled soldier, Mr. Josef Kovar, of Horijany, Czechoslovakia, and announces that the following countrymen have contributed:.... [Names and amounts of contributors are omitted in translation.] Total, $39.50. Those of our countrymen willing to contribute toward this collection may send their donations to the above-mentioned address.
